injectables.name: FormService

classes.name: ExtendedFormArray
ExtendedFormControl
ExtendedFormGroup
ExtendedFormGroupArray

directives.name: DigitOnlyDirective

components.name: DemoComponent
DynamicFormComponent

methodsClass.name: addNewItemToFormArrayWithId
methodsClass.description: ADD NEW ITEM TO FORM ARRAY WITH ID: Duplicates the whole section or a form item within a section

jsdoctags.comment: the id of the form item which should be duplicated
if the formgroup is an array this is the index of the formgroup item

methodsClass.name: removeItemAtIndexFromFormArrayWithId
methodsClass.description: REMOVE ITEM AT INDEX FROM FORM ARRAY WITH ID: Removes the whole section or a form item within a section

jsdoctags.comment: the id of the form item which should be removed and the index of where to remove it
if the formgroup is an array this is the index of the formgroup item

methodsClass.name: shouldRenderControl
methodsClass.description: SHOULD RENDER CONTROL: Determines if the form control should be rendered or not.

jsdoctags.comment: the target form item that should or should not be displayed
if the formgroup is an array this is the index of the formgroup item

components.templateData:
{{ context.category }}

{{ context.title }}

components.name: DynamicFormDataComponent
components.templateData:
{{ header.key }}
{{ val.value }}

components.name: DynamicFormItemComponent
components.templateData:
{{ control.formItem.descriptionHeader }}

{{ control.formItem.description }}

DISCLAIMER
{{ context.label }} {{ context.description }}

components.name: DynamicFormMediaComponent

methodsClass.name: calculateHeight
methodsClass.description: Calculate image height based on the current width, the origin width and the origin height height = currentWidth * naturalHeight / naturalWidth

components.templateData: {{ media.description }}

components.name: DynamicFormModalComponent

variables.name: attributeTypeMapDynamicFormItem
variables.defaultValue:
[
    { name: "key", type: "string" },
    { name: "value", type: "object" },
    { name: "label", type: "string" },
    { name: "description", type: "string" },
    { name: "className", type: "string" },
    { name: "required", type: "boolean" },
    { name: "multi", type: "boolean" },
    { name: "min", type: "object" },
    { name: "max", type: "object" },
    { name: "order", type: "number" },
    { name: "placeholder", type: "string" },
    { name: "options", type: "Array<DynamicFormOption>" },
    { name: "rulerKey", type: "string" },
    { name: "condition", type: "object" },
    { name: "controlType", type: "DynamicFormType" },
    { name: "controlMetaData", type: "object" },
]

variables.name: attributeTypeMapDynamicFormOption
variables.defaultValue:
[
    { name: "value", type: "object" },
    { name: "label", type: "string" },
    { name: "disabled", type: "boolean" },
]

variables.name: attributeTypeMapDynamicFormResponseItem
variables.defaultValue:
[
    { name: "key", type: "string" },
    { name: "value", type: "object" },
    { name: "sectionId", type: "string" },
    { name: "sectionIndex", type: "number" },
    { name: "formItem", type: "DynamicFormItem" },
]

variables.name: attributeTypeMapDynamicFormSection
variables.defaultValue:
[
    { name: "title", type: "string" },
    { name: "category", type: "string" },
    { name: "description", type: "string" },
    { name: "className", type: "string" },
    { name: "key", type: "string" },
    { name: "order", type: "number" },
    { name: "multi", type: "boolean" },
    { name: "sectionType", type: "any" },
    { name: "items", type: "Array<DynamicFormItem>" },
]

variables.name: DynamicFormType
variables.defaultValue:
{
    Text: "Text" as DynamicFormType,
    TextArea: "TextArea" as DynamicFormType,
    Checkbox: "Checkbox" as DynamicFormType,
    Dropdown: "Dropdown" as DynamicFormType,
    Datepicker: "Datepicker" as DynamicFormType,
    Radio: "Radio" as DynamicFormType,
    Number: "Number" as DynamicFormType,
    Card: "Card" as DynamicFormType,
    ToggleSelector: "ToggleSelector" as DynamicFormType,
    Disclaimer: "Disclaimer" as DynamicFormType,
    None: "None" as DynamicFormType,
}

formGroup
